title: The correct theory of the followings about command blocks is:
option_a: Players can only see output logs in bedrock edition.
option_b: You must type "/" at the start of a command.
option_c: Commands can only be executed in cheets.
option_d: You can adjust the maximum number of commands that chain command blocks execute by modifying the gamerule maxCommandChainLength.
explanation:
You can adjust it by typing /gamerule maxCommandChainLength <number>.
Note: It's default value is 65536.
